# kCIInputBacksideImageKey

**Global Variable**

A key to get or set the backside image for a transition Core Image filter.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCIInputBacksideImageKey: String
```

## Discussion

The value for this key needs to be a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance.
title: kCIInputBacksideImageKey
